Cycling

Cycling is a low-impact cardio exercise that is easier on the joints compared to running or other high-impact activities. It offers a great way to build cardiovascular endurance while strengthening the legs, particularly the quadriceps, hamstrings, and calves. Whether performed outdoors or on a stationary bike, cycling is an efficient way to burn calories, improve stamina, and boost overall fitness. It is a highly customizable workout, allowing you to adjust intensity levels to suit your fitness goals, from leisurely rides to intense sprints.
